description: System-generated unique identifier for this sublet detail record on a work order.
System timestamp when this record was created or last updated (likely YYYYMMDDHHMMSSmmm); confirm exact semantics and timezone with SME.
Free-text description of the sublet service or repair performed by the external vendor.
Vendor-provided invoice number or reference associated with this sublet charge.
Purchase order number authorizing the outsourced work for this work order.
Additional notes regarding this sublet line item.
Total billed amount for this sublet line, including all applicable components (currency).
Subtotal amount for this sublet line before taxes, discounts, or additional fees (currency).
Miscellaneous charges associated with this sublet line (e.g., fees, freight).
Internal billing invoice identifier tied to this work order/sublet line (if invoiced to a customer); confirm linkage.
Identifier of the external vendor that performed the sublet work.
System reference/metadata indicating the related entity for vendor linkage; not business data. Confirm usage.
Work order identifier used for accounting/integration purposes; typically mirrors the workorder field. Confirm differences and usage with SME.
System reference/metadata naming the related entity for actwo; not business data.
The work order number to which this sublet charge belongs.
System reference/metadata naming the related entity for workorder; not business data.
Original source-system key for this record, retained for migration or audit purposes.
Name of the source-system table from which this record originated.
Labor cost portion of this sublet charge (as billed by the vendor).
Parts or materials cost portion of this sublet charge (as billed by the vendor).
Other non-labor, non-parts charges for this sublet line (e.g., shop supplies, environmental fees).
Transaction or service date for this sublet entry (YYYYMMDD).
Internal key referencing the linked vendor invoice record or image for this sublet; not the vendorâ€™s invoice number. Confirm mapping.
System reference/metadata naming the related entity for vendor_invoice; not business data.
